metadata.title: CVE-2021-44537 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: ownCloud owncloud/client before 2.9.2 allows Resource Injection by a serverinto the desktop client via a URL, leading to remote code execution.

criterions.comment: owncloud: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
